summary: The Panavia Tornado is a powerful combat plane used by the military. It was made by a team of Italian, British, and German companies. This plane can do many jobs, like fighting and bombing, and has different versions for different tasks. It first flew in 1974 and has been used in many wars since the 1990s, including the Gulf War and conflicts in the Middle East. The Tornado is known for its ability to fly low and strike targets accurately. Over 900 of these planes were built.
title: Panavia Tornado
